thought: To determine if the URL is a scam website, I need to inspect the site's content, pricing, contact information, privacy policy, payment methods, and check for updates. I should also look into the background of the company using domain information and search for any user reports or complaints online.

While privacy protection is common, the newness of the domain in conjunction with other scam characteristics could be concerning. I should investigate further.

Report a Scam Help & Info API & Data Feed en Deutsch English Español Français Italiano 日本 Nederlands Português Romanian Russian Ukrainian 简体中文 en'}, {'url': 'https://www.trustpilot.com/review/verniershop.com', 'content': 'Verniershop Website Product Reviews Are all False. On 3/24/2024, I bought two items from Vernier Shop. Both came as you bought from Dollar store, but with a Five Star customer reviews on their website. Tried to return both items due to not usable, not functional at all, was told I need pay 15% restocking fee.'}, {'url': 'https://uiliu.com/ventyusshop', 'content': 'Ventyusshop.com is an online business which is found to be a bit questionable (in a variety of elements explained below). A small variety of potential customers are undoubtedly pondering if Ventyusshop reviews are in fact genuine and if Ventyusshop should be deemed recommendable.'}, {'url': 'https://www.paypal-community.com/t5/Disputes-and-Limitations/I-accidentally-purchased-tools-from-a-scam-website-How-do-I/td-p/2096040', 'content': "I get an error when I try to use the resolution center to report a problem:
We’re sorry, you can’t file a case on this type of transaction. There was a running shoe store with 40% off... a bit more realistic sale and I was about to make a purchase but then I realized it was the same scam. The fellow is a known scammer and I have forwarded paypal info proving that yet they seem to continue to enable him?
Haven't Found your Answer?
 I guess I'll have to start calling and get used to being on hold, if I can get through to someone.
 So I have been disputing this w/ paypal for about 3 weeks now and they keep moving the expected resolution dates up and up.
Is this normal for Paypal?"}, {'url': 'https://www.scam-detector.com/validator/thevenussshop-com-review/', 'content': 'Amazon Scams; Social Security Scams; PayPal Scams; Bitcoin Scams; Discord Scams; OfferUp Scams; Apple Scams; Auto Scams; Car Buying Scams; Cash App Scams; Craigslist Scams'}]

thought: The search results indicate that there are reviews questioning the legitimacy of ventyusshop.com, and some customers have reported poor experiences with the website. There is a mix of skepticism and negative experiences associated with the site, suggesting it may not be reliable. The mention of "scam" in various review titles and content is a red flag.

thought: The certificate information confirms that the website has a valid SSL certificate issued by Let's Encrypt and Google Trust Services, which is common for legitimate sites. However, having an SSL certificate doesn't automatically make a website legitimate, as scammers can also obtain such certificates for their fraudulent sites. I need to analyze the information collectively to make a final determination. I now know the final answer. Based on the observations, it seems likely that https://ventyusshop.com/ is a scam website.

observation.reason: The website displays characteristics typical of a scam including unusually low prices and free offers a variety of products similar to common e-commerce websites and recent creation date with limited available information about the company. Additionally customer reviews and search results suggest questionable legitimacy and negative experiences. The privacy of the domain registrant is kept private which while not uncommon can sometimes be indicative of a website attempting to hide its true nature.
